name: when we all fall off at the edge of the world
name_original: when we all fall off at the edge of the world
description:
To walk to the end of reality

and stride off the edge of the world

To watch everything shrink away

until nothing remains to be seen

To embrace cosmic smallness

where motion and stasis

are indistinguishable

when we all fall off at the edge of the world is a game about falling off the edge of the world.
